prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Cassie Moncure Lyne, circa 1944

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Scrapbooks ca. 1930-1943, compiled by Cassie Moncure Lyne in memory of her mother, Cassandra Oliver Moncure Lyne, including prints, photographs, programs, pamphlets and extensive handwritten notes. The bulk of the material relates to the genealogy of the Moncure and Lyne families and to the Civil War.
